articles.title: Dolphins' Tyreek Hill, Devon Archane, Raheem Mostert have NFL's fastest recorded speeds - NBC Sports
articles.description: The NFL uses tracking technology to record players' speeds when carrying the ball for the league's Next Gen Stats, and that technology shows what an enormous speed gap exists between the Dolphins and the rest of the NFL.

articles.title: Huawei unveils new products but keeps quiet on Mate 60 Pro technology - South China Morning Post
articles.description: Huawei teases new luxury smartphone and launches a new gold-inlaid smartwatch but makes no comment on the chip behind its Mate 60 Pro handset.
